movies.title: Treasures in Heaven
movies.plot: Two wealthy men respond to Jesus in very different ways. One, who is basically good, is unable to accept Jesus' directive that he give up the treasures of this world for the greater treasures of Heaven. The other, a sinful Publican, struggles to come to grips with his emerging faith in Jesus, and finally accepts with his fellow man and achieving eternal salvation. Zacchaeus is the Chief Publican of Jericho, gaining great wealth by cheating others. His young son has heard of Jesus and wants to go see Him. But Zacchaeus will not give up the opportunity to make money just to listen to a mere "rabbi." In the countryside, a wealthy young man finds Jesus preaching. When he asks Jesus what he must do to inherit eternal life, Jesus tells him to obey the commandments, to sell all he has and give to the poor. The rich man, unable o part with his gold, turns away. " How difficult it is for a rich man to enter the Kingdom of God", observes Jesus. " It is easier for a camel to go through the eye ...
movies.simplePlot: Two wealthy men respond to Jesus in very different ways. One, who is basically good, is unable to accept Jesus' directive that he give up the treasures of this world for the greater ...

biography.bio: Jared Davis is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Jared Davis

biography.bio: Vicki Eccel is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Vicki Eccel

biography.bio: Jonathan Best was born in 1977 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA. He is an actor, known for Silent Night, Deadly Night (1984), The Legend of Wolf Mountain (1992) and Just Like Dad (1995).
biography.name: Jonathan Best

biography.bio: Oscar Rowland was born on March 27, 1926. He was an actor, known for Footloose (1984), Bats (1999) and Promised Land (1987). He was married to Beverly Rowland. He died on October 20, 2010 in the USA.
biography.name: Oscar Rowland

biography.bio: James Horrocks is an actor, known for Dumb & Dumber (1994), China O'Brien II (1990) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: James Horrocks

biography.bio: Wayne Richards is an actor, known for Latter-Day Saint Leaders: Past and Present (1948), Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Wayne Richards

biography.bio: John Nicolaysen is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The Joseph Smith Story (1988) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: John Nicolaysen

biography.bio: Ivan Crosland was born on August 29, 1936. He was an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The ButterCream Gang (1992) and Brigham City (2001). He died on March 26, 2015 in Provo, Utah, USA.
biography.name: Ivan Crosland

tvSerie.name: Animated Stories from the New Testament
